title: Counter-Drones Science & Technology Senior Policy Advisor required

content.text: Are you interested in understanding the security risks posed by drones and the rapidly evolving technology of drone and counter-drones systems?

This post is a SEO policy and science & technology (S&T) hybrid. It sits within the Counter-Drones Unit’s S&T Programme, which leads on understanding the threats and opportunities posed by new technology, designing and coordinating our science and technology projects across Government and helping to shape our policy priorities.
For more information, including the full job description and how to apply, please see Civil Service Jobs webpage here.
Apply before 11:55 pm on Tuesday 19 September 2023
